snippet.title: Rock Hoppers Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A light-hearted but deep first person exploration and survival game for you and your friends set in a procedurally-generated asteroid belt on the edge of known space. Explore the world, learn new skills, build and defend your base, and conquer the belt's unique threats.

Wishlist Rock Hoppers on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2017900/Rock_Hoppers/
